name: Amber
meanings: Witchery skills

name: Black
meanings: Repelling, Ward negativity, Remove hexes, Protection, Spirit contact, Night, Truth, Remove discord or confusion, Banishing and binding. It can be used in meditation to deepen the meditative state.  Waning moon workings. Black does not denote evil in any sense.

name: Blue
meanings: Calm, Tranquility, Truth, Justice, Forgiveness, Dreams, Protection, Communication, Will power, Weight loss, Healing and Change, Working with feelings and emotions. Blue is also associated with the acquisition of knowledge.

name: Light Blue
meanings: Psychic awareness, Intuition, Opportunity, Peace, Understanding, Quests, Safe journey, Patience, Tranquility, Ward depression.

name: Brown
meanings: Finding lost objects, Endurance, Concentration, Material goods, Stability, Animal health, House blessing, Uncertainties, Earth and nature magick, Grounding, Real estate.

name: Copper
meanings: Business success, Passion, Money, Fertility, Career growth.

name: Gold
meanings: Positive attitude, Power, Physical Strength, Success, Achievement, Mental growth, Healing energy, Intuition, Divination, Fortune, Luxury, Male energy, Understanding, Wealth spells and magick. Associated with the Sun God and the power of the light.

name: Green
meanings: Abundance, Prosperity, Money, Material wealth. Success in the workplace, Good luck, Fertility, Healing, Balance, Acceptance, Employment, Courage, Agriculture, Changing direction or attitudes, Growth. Eliminating jealousy, Marriage, Nature magick.

name: Grey
meanings: Combating negativity. Balance and Neutrality, Promote Vision and Clarity in a given situation, Contemplation, Veiling, Cancellation, Hesitation.

name: Indigo
meanings: Vision, Psychic intuition, Deep Meditation, Spiritual guidance, Karma Workings, Neutralize another's magick, Ward slander, Stop gossip, Overcome depression. Indigo is seen as a stopping colour, a colour to use in situations that need an end or a new beginning.

name: Lavender
meanings: Enhance psychic abilities, Knowledge, Intuition, Promote peace, Well being, Sleep, Relieves tensions, Spiritual development, Psychic growth, Divination, Sensitivity to the Other world, Blessings.

name: Orange
meanings: Creativity, Self-expression, Strength, Healing, Pulling things to you, Adaptability, Luck, Vitality, Encouragement, Clearing the Mind, Dominance, Energy both Physical and Magickal, Legal matters, New opportunities, Career, Overcoming addiction, Joy, Business success, Ambition, Fun, Action, Investments.

name: Peach
meanings: Kindness, Sympathy and Empathy, Compassion, Healing

name: Pink
meanings: Romance, Love, Harmony in Emotional Love, Honour, Mortality, Friendship, Self-love, Protection of children, Compassion and Relaxation. Peace at home.

name: Purple
meanings: Psychic awareness, Spiritual development, Spiritual Power, Wisdom, Influence, Intuition, Divination, Ambition, Healing, Progress, Business, Spiritual Communication, Protection, Hidden knowledge, Meditation, Change luck, Break habit, Generating protective energies.

name: Red
meanings: Strength, Truth, Lust, Physical passion, Anger, Respect, Power, Energy, Health, Vigor, Enthusiasm, Motivation, Courage, Passion, Action, Danger, Sexuality, Protection, Sports, Independence, Assertiveness, Competition Personal Power and Determination. Association with the life force of blood.

name: Silver
meanings: Moon, Night, Balance, Channelling, Psychic development, Clairvoyance, Lunar Magick, Meditation, Wards negativity, Intuition, Dreams, Victory. Associated with the Moon Goddess and Feminine energies.

name: Turquoise
meanings: Find alternative answers to difficult situations, Relieve stress

name: Violet
meanings: Self-improvement, Spirituality, Intuition, Insight, Clarity, Success in Searches.

name: White
meanings: White can be substituted for any other color. Unity, Purification, Moon magic, Protection, Truth, Meditation, Peace, Sincerity, Justice, Beginnings, Warding of doubts and fears.  Healing properties, a white candle may be lit to assist healing and recovery from illness. New moon and Full moon workings

name: Yellow
meanings: Self-confidence, Persuasion, Concentration, Pleasure, Happiness and creativity, Inspiration, Divination, Clairvoyance, Mental Alertness, Intellectual growth, Prosperity, Changes, Harmony, Creativity, Confidence, Communication, Flexibility, Friendship, Study, Travel.
